member.name: T:Sias.GripperBarcodeYZ.SGripperBarcodeYZDevice
member.summary:
Gripper barcode Y/Z device class.
The gripper barcode Y/Z device is a gripper Y/Z device (\b see ) with an additional added barcode reader. In addition to the handling arm methods it supports barcode reading arm methods.
member.details:
\ingroup Dev_GripperBarcodeYZ
The gripper barcode Y/Z device is derived from a gripper Y/Z device. In addition the gripper barcode Y/Z device implements the IBarcodeYZDevice interface with - a configuration property for the connected barcode reader; - a configuration property for the barcode read position; - a configuration property for the barcode height move vector; - a configuration property for the barcode read orientation and - a configuration property for the barcode read move speed. . As the device implements IBarcodeYZDevice it can be used with the barcode reading arm method class. So the AddArmMethods method adds a SBarcodeMethods class to the arms Arm method block list.
%SGripperBarcodeYZDevice class diagram
\image html "SGripperBarcodeYZDevice.png"

member.summary:
XML string configuration constructor.
This constructor creates a device by parsing the device parameters from the given XML configuration string.

Manual generation constructor.
This constructor creates a device by using the requested parameters.
member.param: Barcode read offset (relative to Y/Z reference)

member.name: M:Sias.GripperBarcodeYZ.SGripperBarcodeYZDevice.GetErrorInfos
member.summary: This interface function returns the default error messages which can be generated by this device.

member.name: M:Sias.GripperBarcodeYZ.SGripperBarcodeYZDevice.Init(Sias.BaseDev.SDeviceInitOptions)
member.summary:
Init gripper Y/Z device.
This first calls the base initialization method initializing the Z, X and Y motor. Then it initializes the gripper and rotation motor.
member.remarks: The device gets locked/unlocked in this method. Timeout: BCReader.ActionLockTimeout

member.name: M:Sias.GripperBarcodeYZ.SGripperBarcodeYZDevice.ZBarcodeWorktablePos(System.Double)
member.summary: Calculate Z desk position from a given Z motor position.

member.name: M:Sias.GripperBarcodeYZ.SGripperBarcodeYZDevice.ZBarcodeMotorPos(System.Double)
member.summary: Calculate Z motor position from a given Z desk position.

member.name: M:Sias.GripperBarcodeYZ.SGripperBarcodeYZDevice.AddArmMethods(Sias.BaseDev.SBaseArmMethodsCollection,Sias.BaseDev.SBaseArmDevice)
member.summary: Add supported arm methods to given arm method collection a collection.
member.remarks: Take care each arm should not have each method block more then once!
member.returns: A collection of all supported arm method blocks

member.name: M:Sias.GripperBarcodeYZ.SGripperBarcodeYZDevice.XBarcodeRotateOffset(System.Double,Sias.Core.SPosition)
member.summary:
Rotation depending X-Offset of the barcode read position.
If the barcode reader Y/Z device gets turned the barcode read position may change depending on the orientation. This member returns X part of the orientation specific barcode read position.
member.returns: The X-Offset for the given rotation

member.name: M:Sias.GripperBarcodeYZ.SGripperBarcodeYZDevice.YBarcodeRotateOffset(System.Double,Sias.Core.SPosition)
member.summary:
Rotation depending Y-Offset of the barcode read position.
If the barcode reader Y/Z device gets turned the barcode read position may change depending on the orientation. This member returns Y part of the orientation specific barcode read position.
member.returns: The Y-Offset for the given rotation

member.name: P:Sias.GripperBarcodeYZ.SGripperBarcodeYZDevice.BCReader
member.summary: Barcode reader property.

member.name: P:Sias.GripperBarcodeYZ.SGripperBarcodeYZDevice.BarcodeReadOffset
member.summary:
Barcode read offset property.
The barcode read offset defines the position where the barcode should be placed relatively to the Y/Z device reference position.

member.name: P:Sias.GripperBarcodeYZ.SGripperBarcodeYZDevice.BarcodeReadOrientation
member.summary:
Barcode read orientation property.
The barcode orientation is read orientation if the Y/Z device is on orientation 0. It is a kind of orientation offset for the barcode reader. If the barcode reader Y/Z device has a rotation option the orientation can be adjusted to the orientation of the barcode.\n \b Important: To read a barcode with orientation 0 the barcode reader needs to be positioned to an orientation of 180Â°

member.name: P:Sias.GripperBarcodeYZ.SGripperBarcodeYZDevice.HeightMoveVector
member.summary:
Barcode height move vector property.
This vector is used to calculate the barcode read movement. It is multiplied by the height of the barcode to define the barcode read move. 
 - ReadStart = BarcodeReadPosition - (BarcodeHeight/2)*HeightMoveVector 
 - ReadEnd = BarcodeReadPosition + (BarcodeHeight/2)*HeightMoveVector 
   Important: On rotation barcode devices X and Y are getting translated by the orientation.

member.name: P:Sias.GripperBarcodeYZ.SGripperBarcodeYZDevice.BarcodeScanSpeed
member.summary: Barcode scan speed property
